activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy J. Beaty Jr.

Activity: Waiver of Preliminary Hearing  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

03:23 PM Defendant Randy J. Beaty in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video.  Alexander David Goulart and intern Verity Altenberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

03:53 PM Defendant Randy J Beaty Jr  in court in custody by video with attorney Colin T Nicholson by video.  Cheniqua White and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives reading.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Activity: Initial appearance

3:12 PM Defendant Randy J. Beaty in court in custody by video at the Rock County Jail with attorney Walter Isaacson by video. David S Olson and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Signature bond set of $1,650.00 with conditions: No contact directly or indirectly with victim A.V.W., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No possession of any weapons. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 1PM.
